channel.title: New documentation: Manually Create Whonix VM Settings / Restoring .vmdk files
channel.description:
[html]

This is useful, if you have a backup of Whonix .vmdk hard disk images and want to restore them. This could be the case if your VM settings file is damaged or missing for some reason or if you only made a backup of the .vmdk files. See: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Manually_Create_Whonix_VM_Settings

[/html]

item.title: New documentation: Manually Create Whonix VM Settings / Restoring .vmdk files

item.description:
[html]

This is useful, if you have a backup of Whonix .vmdk hard disk images and want to restore them. This could be the case if your VM settings file is damaged or missing for some reason or if you only made a backup of the .vmdk files. See:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Manually_Create_Whonix_VM_Settings
